tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales_performance (
  sale_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sale_date DATE,
  product_id INT,
  quantity_sold INT,
  total_revenue DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales_rep (
    rep_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rep_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    team_id INT,
    hire_date DATE,
    commission_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
);
